creator: Jochen.Schwarze@cit.de
text:
It looks like font antialiasing has vanished since 1.0 RC5. I tested an SVG 
image that uses the standard Windows font "Lucida Sans Unicode" with the SVG 
Browser and Sun JDK 1.3.1 under W2k.

In Batik 1.0 RC5, the text is smooth and very well readable even at small point 
sizes. In 1.1 RC2 the text is ragged and hardly readable even at normal font 
sizes.

Please see the attached SVG sample and two screenshots using the SVG Browser 
from 1.0 RC5 and 1.1 RC2.

Best, Jochen

creator: tkormann@apache.org
text:
this is not a bug. we now implement the text-rendering, shape-rendering and
image-rendering CSS properties.

The attached document specifies :

'text-rendering:geometricPrecision'

which implies that the text is aliased.

Remove this property or use another value to have antialised text.
